name: Fantasy and adventure literature
description: Some of my favorite reads are: The Wheel Of Time by Robert Jordan, Dune by Frank Herbert, The Martian by Andy Weir, Dirk Gently Series by Douglas Adams.

name: Lego
description: One of my favorite build was the Dune Royal Ornithopter (10327)

name: Sudoku
description: That feeling when you solve it and things just come together...

name: Space
description: I love the work of James Webb, Euclid, and Hubble telescope. Nasas Perseverance Rover on Mars has a chip with my name on it, as well as Europa Clipper that is on its way to Jupiters icy moon Europa.
